OOPCourseWork
Interface Play

All Known Implementing Classes:
Albums, CompilationAlbum, MusicLibrary, MusicTrack
public interface Play

Interface Play helps MusicLibrary class, Albums class and MusicTrack class to refresh the number of how many times a track has been played

Version:
(24/10/2014)
Author:
(Yihui Zhang)
